title: Windowed on Mac
body: I want to play on Windowed instead of full screen so i can see the whole screen alot easier , but when i slide my cursor to slide the screen once it touches the edge of the window it turns into the default mac cursor again as apposed to the glove that u have in game as ur cursor and i have to hover over a tower or something to fix it .  basically my mouse goes past the border a tad bit if im moving my mouse quickly and keeps messing with my cursor is there anyway to fix it i know this only happens on macs :/

replies.body:
Does this happen if you use *Borderless* instead of Windowed? It's still a windowed mode, it just takes up more of the screen without running in Full Screen mode.

Let me know if this resolved the cursor issue for you.
